price: 106. En zoek Vergiffenis bij Allah, zeker, Allah is de altijd Vaak-vergevende, de Genadevolle.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
